name: Feign Death
flavorText: You slow your breathing and heartbeat so you appear to be dead.
text: You enter a deep trance that slows your heartbeat and breathing to become almost imperceptible. While in this state, you appear unconscious or dead, but you are aware of your surroundings. You can emerge from the trance as a free action. Other creatures perceive you as dead unless they make a Heal check or Insight check equal to your check result + 10.
